descriptionHtml:
Update: Fixed issue with robes being unenchantable. All should be working smoothly now. 
Update: Added an alternative .esp with an unarmoured version of the robes. 

:: Description :: 

Aiming to add a little variety to the world. This mod adds Wanderer\'s Robes (recoloured and standalone Greybeard robes) and Hood to some levelled lists. Throwing them into the levelled lists was just for fun, a little more interesting than simply adding them to a vendor or random chest. For those who fancy getting their hands on the Robes as soon as possible, check out the spoiler section in the readme.

I should also note that the backpack in the screens isn\'t included in the mod.

:: Installation ::

Extract contents to Skyrim/Data and be sure to only activate one of the .esp files.

Thanks for downloading, and enjoy!
author: Noodles
